text:
On this [[page|Page]] are some Tools for the [[Project Hitchhikers]] Guide.

# Menus
These menus will be installed by the GuideApp on GuideLoad:

- [[Tiddlywiki Menu]]
- [[Edit]]
- [[Tiddlywiki Plugins Menu]]
- [[Tiddlywiki Tiddler Menu]]

# Libraries
These libraries will be loaded and used by the GuideApp on GuideLoad:

# Actions
Click this radiobutton to install or remove the tools listed on this page:

<$button type="button" class="btn btn-warning btn-sm">Install Guide Tools <$callLivecode message="InstallGuideTools"/></$button>
<$button type="button" class="btn btn-danger btn-sm">Remove Guide Tools <$callLivecode message="RemoveGuideTools"/></$button>
<$button type="button" class="btn btn-info btn-sm">Edit lib_TiddlyMessage <$callLivecode message="EditScript stack 'lib_TiddlyMessage'"/></$button>

# Other Menus
We'd like to make these list items draggable so that your menu can be customised simply by draggging items into the **Actions** section above.
title: Guide Tools
